sentence.Network_en: Wherever they went they were closely followed by security men.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管上哪儿，保安人员都紧跟在他们身后。

sentence.Network_en: They agreed to work co-operatively to ease tensions wherever possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们同意互相配合尽一切努力缓解紧张局势。

sentence.Network_en: Wherever he goes, a carload of soldiers goes with him.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管他去哪里，总有一车士兵跟着。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词立体记忆 ... → whenever 无论何时，随时 → wherever 无论哪里 → whichever 无论哪一个.
新课标普通高中英语单词_百度知道 ... pay attention to 注意；留心；关心 wherever  conj 无论在哪里 nearby adj 附近的.

list.abs: 性感拉丁狂舞炫(3CD)-音乐-亚马逊中国 ... 01 I need to know 我需要知道 02 Whenever wherever 无论何时 03 Objection 反对.
... wherever conj 在任何地方 whenever wherever 夏奇拉 ; 随时随地 ; 无论何时 ; 野性十足的 or wherever 或其他类似地方.

... WE WILL ROCK YOU 一起来摇滚（皇后乐队） WHEREVER YOU WILL GO 无论你去那儿（职业青年乐队） YOU RND I 你和我…

lj.lj_ly: it is bound to have originated in Taiwan or wherever.
lj.lj_ls: 它一定起源于台湾或别的什么地方。

entry.def: You use wherever to indicate that something happens or is true in any place or situation.

example.ex: Some people enjoy themselves wherever they are...
Jack believed in finding happiness wherever possible...
example.tran: 杰克认为应该及时行乐。

entry.def: You use wherever when you indicate that you do not know where a person or place is.

example.ex: I'd like to leave as soon as possible and join my children, wherever they are...
example.tran: 我想尽快离开，回到儿女们中间去，不管他们在哪儿。

example.ex: 'Till we meet again, wherever that is,' said the chairman.

entry.tran: (用在疑问句中作为where的强调形式，通常表示惊讶)究竟在哪里
entry.def: You use wherever in questions as an emphatic form of 'where', usually when you are surprised about something.

example.ex: Wherever did you get that idea?...
example.tran: 你到底从哪儿得来的那个主意？

entry.def: You use or wherever to say that something might happen in a place other than the place you have mentioned, but that you are not able to say exactly where.

example.ex: The next day she was gone to Lusaka, Kampala, or wherever.
example.tran: 第二天她去了卢萨卡，坎帕拉或别的什么地方。

example.ex: ...language which will allow the students in class or wherever to express their opinions.
example.tran: 学生可以用来在课堂上或其他什么地方表达自己想法的语言

means.word_mean: 1. in or at or to what place;

auth_sentence.content: People expect to have infinite bits wherever they go.
auth_sentence.res_content: People expect to have infinite bits wherever they go.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People expect to have infinite bits wherever they go.

auth_sentence.content: Wherever they can find little nooks to settle into.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wherever they can find little nooks to settle into.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wherever they can find little nooks to settle into.

auth_sentence.content: They are no longer wherever they used to be.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are no longer wherever they used to be.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are no longer wherever they used to be.

Sentence.sentence: He tells the story of a patient, a first-time mother who complained that her young son was always clinging to her, wrapping himself around her legs wherever she went.

sentences.en: I will find him wherever he may be.
sentences.cn: 无论他在哪儿, 我都要找到他。

sentences.en: Wherever possible, the illustrations are taken from literature.
sentences.cn: 只要有可能, 例证都取自文学作品。

sentences.en: Wherever the film star goes, there are crowds of people waiting to see her.
sentences.cn: 这位电影明星所到之处都有成群的人等着见她。
你究竟要把我带到什么地方去?

jushi.english: Wherever the film star goes, there are crowds of people waiting to see her.
jushi.chinese: 这位电影明星所到之处都有成群的人等着见她。

jushi.english: You can come whenever you like.
jushi.chinese: 只要你想来,无论何时都可以。

jushi.english: Wherever possible, the illustrations are taken from literature.
jushi.chinese: 只要有可能,例证都取自文学作品。
